rule.Name: BadRecursiveInvocationRule
rule.problem: Method or property '{0}' invokes itself recursively in a suspcious way.
rule.solution: Ensure that the parameters vary in such a way that the recursion will terminate.

rule.Name: NullDerefRule
rule.problem: Method or property '{0}' might dereference a null pointer, or cause other code to do so.
rule.solution: Examine the detailed listing of problem locations, and ensure that the variables in question cannot be null.

rule.Name: CallingEqualsWithNullArgRule
rule.problem: Method '{0}' calls Object.Equals (Object) with null argument.
rule.solution: Pass some other appropriate argument than null, as passing null parameter should always return false.
